[Name:2][Text:Hey, $Name$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.][Default]
[Name:ShopOpen][Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Selection:Shop]

[Name:Task_0_End][Text:Already done? Great work. With the $WorldObject_40$ built, we can make bricks and planks. It's kind of hard to build a town without them, you know.
Here, I drew up some plans for a house for you. You should get that built before nightfall, better to have your own space.][Face:Happy][UnlockBuildingID:27]

[Name:Architect][Text:$Name$! I'm glad to see you. So, I've been thinking... I've just about finished witht he plans I brought with me. If I'm going to design any more buildings, I'm going to need a place to work. Could you build this for me?]
